Lab Test

Omega provides complete body check-up and Lab test to you and your family at a lesser amount. Also, our expert’s team will come to collect the blood to patient home and will give the report at home.

What we Provide?

We offer multiple lab tests such as Diabetics test, Diagnostics test and blood test etc. Omega gives 24*7 services and provides every possible test at home with the help of certified lab partners. We provide reports to patients Via calls and Emails ASAP.
We provide every individual health check-up & Lab test. Our Patient doesn’t need to come for anything because for that we provide home test facilities.
